source.sql: SELECT documentId AS src_id, Name AS title, content AS content, [size] AS filesize, score AS virtual_price, DATEDIFF(S,'1970-01-01 00:00:00', fillTime) - 8 * 3600 AS add_time, format AS fileext, userName AS uploaded_by_username, userID AS uploaded_by_id, downLoadNum AS download_times, averageToScore AS review_score, docGuid AS guid FROM Document WHERE filltime > '[%update_time]' AND status = 1 ORDER BY documentId ASC
